VERY_HIGH.use_case: Slam-dunk matches. Safe to auto-suggest prominently.

HIGH.use_case: Confident suggestion. Zero FP in golden set.

MODERATE.use_case: Show with 'likely match' label. FPs are family resemblance.

LOW.use_case: Deep search / 'possible match'. Requires human judgment.

key_findings: Zero FP ceiling at distance < 1.05 (across 3713 negative pairs)
Family resemblance is primary FP source above 1.05
Raising HIGH threshold from 1.00 to 1.05 is risk-free
